content: When I updated to v1.1.90 of the publisher, my IG build failed with an error that a filename was too long (> 100 bytes). I modified the instance name to shorten the generated filename. Is the file name size limitation a new check in the publisher?
There's a length limit on ids, which often correlates to filename. Not sure if there are other limitations. @Grahame Grieve?
Yes, it was probably the ID I modified, but it didn't fail prior to using the stated version of the Publisher
umm weird. It shouldn't fail just for that purpose. What is the stack?
I mean, 100 bytes is a package limit but there's code to work around that
